title: On Technology Part IV
content:
Especially the technology that people use while driving. Not GPS systems this time, but rather hands free sets for cell phones. I almost crashed into someone the other day. It took me a while to realise what the idiot was doing.
He was screaming and shouting and shaking his fists and pointing at something on his dashboard. At first I thought he was angry at me, but then I realised he wasn’t even looking at me. He was talking into a cell phone mounted on his dashboard.

What’s the point in using a hands free kit if you are going to use hand gestures to get your point across anyway?
